item.title: Michael Sloan, Co-Creator of ‘The Equalizer,’ Dies at 78
item.description: Michael Sloan, the television writer and producer who co-created TV series “The Equalizer” with Richard Lindheim, died Wednesday in New York City. He was 78. Born in New York City in 1946,
